sentences.sentence: The pair are set to discuss bilateral relations and the ongoing grain shipment and trucking dispute between their two countries.

sentences.sentence: Thousands of people protested in Galicia against the local government's handling of the plastic pellet crisis on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Hundreds of thousands of small white pellets have washed ashore in northern Spain since the beginning of January, after falling from a container ship off the coast of Portugal last month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Among the protesters were the main opposition candidates in Galicia's regional elections, which will take place on the 18th of February.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Local authorities declared an environmental emergency on the 9th of January. Galicia, in collaboration with the neighbouring region of Asturias, also affected by the crisis, asked the Spanish central government for help.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The Spanish public prosecutor's office has opened an investigation into the environmental crisis, fearing that the pellets have toxic properties and could jeopardize food safety.
